reviewText:
Clean, no obscenities  and had a plot that could be followed.
The whole family enjoyed it.did not have to worry about unexpected scenes.
i would recommend this product to everyone. i would recomment this cover to everyone. i will order again with this vendor. i am loving it!
This movie is one funny movie, especially pedro infante he makes every role he plays seem so natural, the cast is also very good a movie worth seeing.

Tengo algunas peliculas de Pedro Infante y estoy tratando de completar la coleccion lo mas que se pueda, asi pues esta pelicula es parte de la coleccion, Se mira bien, llego a tiempo.  Otra buena pelicula de Pedro Infante, dure algun tiempo buscandola  gracias a Amazon que la encontre.

I would say this is more a Marga Lopez film than Pedro Infante. She had to really step up to get this character- an Oscar worthy performance I think. Pedro is well cast here as someone who has to come into his own by the end of the film. There are some light parts to this, but I wouldn't by any means call it a romantic comedy, and maybe call it a romantic drama. I would give this less than 5 stars maybe, but when I reflect on Marga Lopez and Pedro Infante in this -and with their other films together, esp. Cartas Marcadas [Import NTSC Region 1 and 4] Marga Lopez, Pedro Infante, then I can only give it 5.
